title: Laudato Si' Movement (@LaudatoSiMvmt) / Twitter
body: #NewYork faces the worst air pollution due to #wildfires in Canada. ... World Environment Day brings solutions to plastic pollution into focus. 2023 marks the 50th anniversary of World Environment Day, after it was established by the United Nations General Assembly in 1972. Over the past five decades, with the UN Environment Programme (UNEP)...
